    • Uses of InstanceInitializer in org.hibernate.search.engine.impl

      Classes in org.hibernate.search.engine.impl that implement InstanceInitializer 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  HibernateSessionLoadingInitializer
      This EntityInitializer is relative to a specific Hibernate Session, so it's able to attach detached collections to it's Session.
      class  HibernateStatelessInitializer
      To be used for Hibernate initializations which don't need a specific Session.
